author: Cody Tracy
comment: Love how quick it is. Would like to be able to sort icons and change the number of columns. Maybe a settings app on the phone?
title: Love the lightweight launcher

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: No customization options, no sorting of apps, also not very burn in friendly.

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. I will consider a bottom position. However, I feel it would get in the way of notifications (Android Wear 2.0)

author: Adam Pristel
comment: How do you open the settings though?

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: When on the notification to Start/Stop the floating launcher, swipe left for a list of settings. If you have swiped away the Start/Stop notification itself, you can show it back by launching wLauncher again (by tapping on the floating icon and then selecting wLauncher).

title: Nice!

author: Krzysztof Nowik
comment: Thanks for speedy launcher. I love it. Is transparency background slow it down much? I really like transparency bg.

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback and rating. 

Transparent background should not make much difference to the speed of the launcher but I preferred to go with an all black background. I will consider including an option for transparency in future updates.

title: No shame lags like with mini launcher

author: Rod Webb
comment: This is the best launcher as far as I'm concerned, the little floating widget for opening the launcher is better that a sliding style opening. With the slide to the side style opening it gets a bit confusing when closing other applications. Great job... never get rid of the floating widget to open the app drawer.

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content:
Thank you for your valuable feedback, Rod Webb. You could email and share what you would expect more from this app to improve it further.

Cheers!

title: Great launcher for your watch

author: Sylve Image
comment: I REALLY do like the app drawer ... The floating icon is cool but I would really like to see it be able to be placed anywhere, but then be able to lock it in place ... Also if there were a custom color wheel so I can change it with my watch face ... Thanks for the great work Dev.

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, Sylve. Your comments will be considered for future releases.

title: Really NICE App !!

author: O Montanez
comment: I've tried a at least a dozen wearable launchers this by far is the cleanest, minimalist and efficient launcher yet.  Keep up the good work and improvements!

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable feedback, O Montanez.

title: Moto 360

author: jovanni carlos
comment: This app is great! I'm using wear launcher at the moment and it can get in the way when swiping. This however is great since it stays in one place. I'll hopefully do a later review but it doesn't get better than 5. Thanks!

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable feedback! Appreciate it.

title: Great app!

author: David Poff
comment: Seems excellent, but the button shows up almost off screen on the moto 360 making it near unusable.

reply.author: Kenneth Mascarenhas
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. Beta v1.9 now supports Moto360. Any feedback will be appreciated.

title: Moto 360 support?
